state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    actor user
    participant browser
    participant server

    user->>browser: Creates a new note and clicking the submit button
    browser->>server: POST https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/new_note_spa
    activate server
    server->>server: creates new note
    server->>server: push note to notes list
    server-->>browser: responds with status code 201
    deactivate server
    browser->>browser: rerenders only note list
